name: Nightmare Weaver

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Intimidate 2 ranks, ability to cast darkness.

sections.text: By spending a full-round action to cast darkness, you can also make Intimidate checks to demoralize all foes in the spell's initial area.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: This feat counts as Dazzling Display for purposes of qualifying for Deadly Stroke and Shatter Defenses.
sections.name: Special

description: You can use your ability to create magical darkness to terrorize enemies.
